text: We demand the right to vote as citizens of this country. Justice and equality are our cause.
author: Susan B. Anthony

text: The political arena is no place for women. Their role is at home, raising children and preserving morality.
author: Josephine Jewell Dodge

text: Women must have a voice in government if democracy is to be complete.
author: Emmeline Pankhurst

text: Giving women the vote will ruin the family and degrade public life.
author: Anti-Suffrage Association

text: Suffrage is a natural right. The denial of this right is tyranny.
author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton
